mapper.select: SELECT * FROM content ORDER BY c_no DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{startNo}

select s.c_no, s.c_able, c_name, c_level, if(s.c_able-30<=0,0,s.c_able-30) c_discount, (c_price*s.c_able/10) c_price, c_price*(s.c_able/10)*(1-(if(s.c_able-30<=0,0,s.c_able-30)/100)) c_sellprice,(1-(if(s.c_able-30<=0,0,s.c_able-30)/100)) from content c
left join (select c_no, SUBSTRING_INDEX (SUBSTRING_INDEX(content.c_able,',',numbers.n),',',-1) c_able from (select 1 n union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10) numbers INNER JOIN content on CHAR_LENGTH ( content.c_able ) - CHAR_LENGTH ( REPLACE ( content.c_able , ',' , '' ))>= numbers . n-1) s on c.c_no=s.c_no where s.c_no=#{c_no} order by s.c_able
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe (SUB_NO, SUB_C_NO, T_M_ID, SUB_DATE, SUB_PRICE, SUB_ABLE, SUB_CONNECTION) VALUES (#{sub_no}, #{sub_c_no}, #{t_m_id}, #{sub_date}, #{sub_price}, #{sub_able}, #{sub_connection})
mapper.select: select s.* , c_name from subscribe s, content where s.sub_c_no = content.c_no and t_m_id = #{t_m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grp (t_m_id, g_name, g_cnt, g_start, g_end) VALUES (#{t_m_id}, #{g_name}, #{g_cnt}, STR_TO_DATE(#{g_start}, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{g_start}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 90 DAY));
mapper.select: select s.* , c_level, c_no, c_name from subscribe s, content where s.sub_c_no = content.c_no and sub_no = #{sub_id}

select g.*, member.m_name, content.c_name, content.c_level from grp g, subscribe, member, content where g.sub_no = subscribe.sub_no and subscribe.sub_c_no = content.c_no and g.t_m_id = member.m_id and g_no = #{g_no}
SELECT l.*, member.m_name FROM learner l, grp, member where grp.g_no = l.l_g_no and l.l_m_id = member.m_id and grp.g_no = #{g_no}
